entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 07:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: E 60 km/h gust 77 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1 except minus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 this morning then northeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High plus 1 except minus 2 inland. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
